website_summaries.verdict: The charm and visual appeal of walnut mixed with the practical benefits of large underseat storage.
pros: The walnut finish creates a solid protective barrier and increases impact and scratch resistance
cons: The construction materials used makes this a heavy bench

website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable bench to use for long periods with backrest and arm rests.
pros: Gorgeous entryway bench with a rich and beautiful walnut finish
Bench is large and sturdy at 44 inches long with an 18-inch seat height
Design will remind you of Mission furniture style
Assembly is a straightforward process that doesn't take as long as you might think
cons: Storage area is only accessible by lifting the wooden seat

customer_reviews.title: Not solid wood!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bench less than 6 months and, even though it was used for mostly decoration/space-filler and holding the odd handbag, the hinge broke the "wood" seat while I opened it. There was no stress or strain that caused this - it simply snapped off. This is NOT solid wood but something more along the lines of particle board. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Vielavesta

customer_reviews.title: Nice...but out of square
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid for a self-installed item, I expected the holes to, at least, line up, so the bench seat does not scrape the arm and base sides on its way up and down We took it apart and re-installed...helped only a bit. So we either take it apart again and drill new holes, risking the integrity of the wood, or we continue to use it while it scrapes away the wood on one side. If this was not an issue, I would give it 5 stars as the instructions were easy, all the parts were nicely labeled, and it did not take too much time for the initial installation.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy M. Kuechler

customer_reviews.title: If you like the look buy this now.
customer_reviews.text: OK, so I don't write many reviews. I felt it was important to review this product because it seems to get a bad rap. My wife and I put this together today in about 15 minutes. All the parts were marked labeled and easily assembled. True the instructions leave something to be desired, but if you can follow some pictures it's easy to figure out. I did add some glue on the dowels as a another reviewer suggested. The item states it is only supposed to hold up to 200 pounds. I am 235 pounds and it held me just fine. Overall, we are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bench, dubious quality over time
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bench a little more than a year ago. It was easy to assemble, looks good in our foyer, and is big enough for a family of six to store all our footwear. We liked how the hinge assembly kept the lid open after we lifted it. However, a few days ago the metal rod piece used to keep the bench lid in place warped and broke out rendering our bench much less useful. I am going to try to obtain replacement parts but I don't know how easy that process will be. The warranty is only 6 months so likely I will have to pay for the new parts out of pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sokolowsky

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made and no recourse from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this bench and figured it would be perfect at our front entry way to store shoes and avoid clutter. A little over a month from delivery the hinge on the top lid snapped off as the pressboard its made of came apart. As it was just outside of 30 days, Amazon could not assist with replacement and directed us to the manufacturer. When we finally got a response we were told the lid was on back order and they had no idea when one would be in. They also refused to replace the bench. disappointed that no one is standing behind this product. waste of $140 for one month use. I caution anyone considering purchasing this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The holes on the back piece misaligned, and one not complete. I fixed this myself, as I had appropriate tools to adjust this. I would have been ok if that were the only issue. As soon as I installed the hinges, and went to close the lid, for the first time, the metal plate with the peg ripped completely off of the lid. Making it unusable as there is now no pivot point. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Five stars for this bench with storage
customer_reviews.text: I certainly have no complaints with this item! Arrived in a sturdy box. No visible damage, imperfections, missing parts. It's sturdy, exactly as depicted. All holes in the right places. I put this together by myself in about one hour. The wood is beautiful, flawlessly finished, and the piece is quite attractive. I almost didn't order this because of some of the reviews, but my experience was a very pleasant one, and I strongly recommend this bench to all buyers. I only give five stars when I am extremely satisfied, and this is definitely a five-star item.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: pretty large bench! seats 3 across for average sized adults. I'm using it as a safe bedside place to put my co-sleeper/basinet for a new baby, and it provides more than enough storage underneath for anything I could possibly need for caring for the baby in the first weeks (diapers, clothes, etc) I'm using the SwaddleMe By Your Side Sleeper and it fits perfectly with about an inch to spare.
customer_reviews.author: D R Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Good overall quality,minus the bottom insert.
customer_reviews.text: I am for the most part happy,it is good quality and beautiful,fairly easy to put together,onlg 2 things i am unhappy/disappointed in or would be 5 stars,when i first opened the box and unwrappes the pieces there was a noticeble crack on the backrest piece,it became more prominent once i put it together and is very noticeable now not sure if it happened before packaged or during shipment,other thing is the insert for the bottom to hold shoes i expected to be as solid as the rest of the bench but it is thin cardboard?i assume and only holds up to 30lbs hopefully i wont ever exceed that.otherwise it was well worth the money and time spent putting together.
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha O.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice storage bench. Arrived in great condition with no scratches or chips. Definitely requires 2 people to put together but doesn't take long at all. About a half hour to an hour. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because the assembly directions for the last 2 steps should be reversed. Putting the bottom in is the last step & putting the holding brackets in is the 2nd to last step. but it should be the second the last step because you can't get the bottom in once you put the holding brackets in. So switch the last 2 steps around & it's a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Chassten

customer_reviews.title: Extra seating and shoe storage
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in good time and was well packed and in good shape. The directions to assemble this piece are "pictures only." While it was fairly easy to assemble, we found that the seat of the bench, that is the top of the storage area did not align perfectly and rubs on one of the arms of the bench, making it a bit of a challenge to open and close. It is a perfect fit for the spot I had in mind and I topped it with a colorful cushion to match the decor. Also makes a great seat for the grandkids when they visit.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Keene

customer_reviews.title: Screws and parts that break easily!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this on 3/23, and we’re in the process of moving. So we put it together yesterday once we moved into our new home. As my husband put it together, one of the screws broke off. Normally my husband wouldn’t mind if he lost a screw, he could just replace it.... but this broke off into the hinge, like the screw literally broke in half! My next step is to contact the seller and Amazon! My husband said the holes weren’t lining up either.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Lame and easy to damage
customer_reviews.text: It’s really hard to put together by yourself. Make sure you pay really close attention to the confusing instructions. I was 3/4 done and realized I missed something. Even though it looked like a bench to me! Don’t get distracted. I recommend having a good drink before getting this started because you’re going to get mad. Also, it’s really easy to scratch and damage while assembling. It’s definitely not worth $100. I would’ve paid $40 tops. Maybe $45. It’s cute definitely, but yeah not worth what I paid. There are parts that already fell off and it arrived scraped and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: shelabes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were made wrong, on one page it told us a side was 6A but looking at the picture it was clearly 5A so confusing because then next page read something different . Also there was no holes to put in the metal closing hangers , there was no holes to attach the other side of the arm rest . Not worth the hassle or the money honestly .
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute bench and looks very sturdy but it was a pain to put together. One of the dowels wasn't in the right spot so I had to make the hole bigger and force it together. Also the instructions weren’t exactly helpful. You have to put the lid on while installing one of the ends. Don’t forget this step or you will be taking it back apart. It also scratches super easily and it came with a damaged corner which is hidden thankfully. Overall I’m pretty happy with the bench I just think they need to make these small improvements or lower the price.
customer_reviews.author: LillyRowe

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bench
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this I was using an old falling apart chest. I was excited to find this because I needed storage but my husband needed a place to sit to take off his boots at the end of the day...2 birds 1 stone. I knew ahead of time from reading other reviews that the pre drilled holes didn't completely line up well. Sure enough, it was a struggle to get things to fit as it was. I did end up using a drill to put this together and that made a big difference. It looks really good and holds all my yoga stuff without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price, couple issues though.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Had to drill three of the holes for install myself. Had them on one end of back piece, not the other. 2. "storage capacity" of 30lbs may be correct, but is only so because of cheap bottom board. (can easily upgrade yourself with mesh/ wood/ proper reinforcing.) Other than that, great color, easy assembly, beautiful piece in our doorway.
customer_reviews.author: jason l dyson

customer_reviews.title: Love it but has flaws
customer_reviews.text: Love it but has flaws. Dowells wouldnt line up correctly on one side, had to remove one. Scratch on the top. The seat top hits the side arm rest closing. Overall, I love the piece. But wouldnt order it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received defective rejects
customer_reviews.text: Despicable quality, irdered few and had to exchange due to defective parts, received somebody's else's defective returns. Company 1800 number for replacement parts asks to leave a message, no response. If these were in perfect condition they woukd be great, but i was sent all the rejects!!!
customer_reviews.author: evitka12345

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: Believe the reviews. At first, I was fairly happy with the quality of the pieces for the price as I unpacked them. The bottom of the bench will be flimsy, but I'm not afraid to sturdy it up if I need to. What's extremely frustrating is that the hinges for the lid come pre-mounted and the manufacturer installed them incorrectly. Now I'm waiting on parts to fix it. I just emailed them today so we'll see how long this takes. I'm being generous with 2 stars because overall I like the look if this gets resolved. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tjlcm5

customer_reviews.title: Decent storage bench for entry or at the of a bed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and packaging was done well. I was able to assemble it alone. The initial assembly had to be done by hand with an Allen wrench and could not be done with an electric drill so it took a little bit more time and energy than I thought. The end result is very nice so it was worth it so far. If anything changes, I'll update tge review.
customer_reviews.author: SCR

customer_reviews.title: Its not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in my mud room to remove boots. At first glance it looked ok, it wasnt in the color that i ordered. The finish is sprayed on and it can be seen by missed areas along edges. All the predrilled holes did line up. The finished surface along one edge has seperated from base wood and will peel up if I dont fix it. Plan to add a seat cushion to prevent any more peeling. Overall I gave this a 3 star easy to assemble finish quality not really that great.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry seat and storage bench after alteration.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice entryway bench after relatively easy assembly. This took about an hour and a half to assemble by one person. Took longer to identify all the parts and to understand wordless instructions (pictures). Storage area is limited by the weight it can store more than the space. Will add extra wood slats underneath the storage box to strengthen bottom cardboard so that boots and extra tennis shoes can be put inside when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: MsssMel

customer_reviews.title: Parts incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Putting the bench together would’ve been way easier had the appropriate parts been given. On the lid portion there are corner brackets with prongs sticking out to insert into the sides of the bench. The brackets provided made the lid lopsided and wouldn’t close. After figuring this out, I just swapped it to the other side. Unfortunately it now shows on the bench instead of being hidden in the closed portion. (See pictures attached). The predrilled holes were not lined up as well. Easy enough fix with a drill but still inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Low interior weight limit, Very satisfied overall
customer_reviews.text: Initial impressions after assembly: To sit on seems very sturdy! Looks great. I wish the interior storage compartment had a higher weight limit! 30 lb. COULD perhaps be rectified by replacing the flimsy bottom board with my own board and adding L brackets. In one of the photos in the instructions seemed incorrect to me, though the labels were correct. Mine arrived missing one screw hole, so I actually had to drill it myself. Was still able to assemble fairly easily and fairly quickly. Would buy again. Some people were asking: the seat weight limit is 275 lb.
customer_reviews.author: I. Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the size, quality, of this item. Its almost child size. And it had several dings in the wood pieces you don't see but still expected better. My husband had a very hard time putting it together as it strictly says to not use a drill. I would not recommend this item. The cushion I ordered with it was ridiculous as well. Did not fit the length of the bench. Or went well proportionately. Tiny bench huge cushion.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Termite in the bench
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bench for front porch of my house. I was excited and assembled it. After two days noticed some powder like stuff near the hand rest. When I looked at it closely I could notice termites in it. I was horrified to keep it near my home. Again disassembled and packed it and sent it back. I request seller to be careful about selling his stuff and please treat the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Vaishali

customer_reviews.title: Solid material and looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: This item looks great and was easy to put together- had no help! Directions were easy to follow and hardware attached easily in the pre-marked/cut spots. You might need your own Allen wrench if the little tool they give you strips out. Took a little more than an hour to assemble. The only minus I have is that the bottom insert could have been more sturdy; it's only heavy formboard. But if you are only storing blankets and pillows or clothes, you should never have any problems. This is a great piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This isnt bad for the money I really cant complain. Its a nice touch to my entryway. The only thing is the bottom is very thin so shoes are about the only thing that goes inside and the lid is slightly crooked on one side and makes the other side very tight and hits the side when you open it. Over time I am sure it will wear down and look bad so I am not to happy about that. My husband put it together pretty quick took about 20 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and has nice storage space.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. The bottom piece of the storage is a bit flimsy so I wouldn't recommend putting anything heavy inside. However, it has worked perfectly for holding our extra blankets, towels for our dogs, and winter jackets/snow pants. We put this in our laundry room and It has worked great as a place for me to sit and read while waiting for a load of laundry to finish, or as a place for me to set a basket of clothes. The color is true to the picture and beautiful. You may need a seat cushion if you plan to use this regularly for seating.
customer_reviews.author: ~Hannah~

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the pictured piece.
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to assemble. The color is a dark espresso, which makes the piece look rich and pricey! I have mine draped with a Native American carpet piece and it looks lovely in my entry way. It's very functional for sitting to put shoes on/off or just to use for a plant or some books. The size was perfect since it's not tiny but also not massive. I like the simple lines that go with any other furniture. It feels sturdy when sitting on it and the storage in the bench for my extra throws is a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Calireyna

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking addition to my room and I store my bedding in it. The simple design fits the look I am going for. The back and legs are wood but the sides and top are pressed board so it would not be good for a porch or anywhere moisture could get to it. For the price it is great! I did the research and a hard wood equivalent is five to eight times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Charlamaine

customer_reviews.title: TRIPLE CHECK FOR DEFECTS
customer_reviews.text: Looked promising with some of the good and bad reviews especially for a decent price. Unfortunately for me it was a waste of my time. The factory installed Hinges to the lid of the storage bench labled Part#1 was defective. Closed and opened at a angle which caused it to scratch the inside of the arm rest Part#3A. Pre drilled holes didnt match exactly which caused one of the screws to strip. Didnt bother to contact the company for them to send spare parts.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Colon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, all wood
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, for each of my boys rooms. They are excellent so far. Beautiful, NO particle board. They are all solid, the bottom of the inside on the bench is only a very thin piece of wood, which is the only thing I am worried about. Waiting for it to be broken easily.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! Got it for my sons room to put his toys in. It has plenty of space and it really compliments his little room. Its also really sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful looking, super easy to build, and is comfortable! My other half and I are 400 pounds together and had no issues sitting on it! Only thing thing I was disappointed about was the board for the bottom.... it’s super thin and doesn’t hole much of anything... we will be putting in a better board!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I could not assemble it because the dowels and the holes didn't line up between the top lid and one of the side pieces. Very poorly designed for assembly. Also some of the pieces had discoloration and irregularities. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Really nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Okay so assembly was a bear for one person but doable. A few connections did not line up as precisely as they should and some of the predrilled holes were not very deep and getting the screws in was difficult without a power screw driver (allen wrench included). The finish piece however looks nice, is very sturdy, and provides the extra storage needed. If you are even a little handy you can handle this project. It took approximately 45 minutes to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved this
customer_reviews.text: This item had many mixed reviews but I decided to take a chance because it was what I was looking for and a great price. I was extremely happy. I use this item daily and it is a beautiful addition to my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Angela R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a solid sturdy bench. Needed a place to put shoes on and be able to store seldom used shoes and winter hats and gloves. Easy enough to pit together and good and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: We thought we would take a chance and buy this sight unseen. It turns out to be mostly well-made. It is sturdy, real wood. Some issues with the holes lining up while putting it together. The inside seat bottom is flimsy, you can put gloves, scarves, hats and umbrellas in it but anything too heavy will bow the bottom. Not too difficult to put together, took me about 30 minutes. So far it has held two normal sized adults sitting on it at the same time (350 poundsish) with no problem. The lid works well, no rubbing when opening or closing. Be sure to check the dimensions, it is a little small but that's what we were looking to buy.
customer_reviews.author: RecceNav

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, however made with POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bench and after assembling it looks good. I observed the following issued with the product. * The assembly instructions are not easy * Couple of pieces (front supporting wall and back supporting wall) I received are swapped and caused more difficulties during assembly * The item looks good however it is made with poor material quality * During assembly one of the given screw poked the wood. I did not use any power tools, even with the given tool it cracked the wood. * For the back rest couple of screws never tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi K

customer_reviews.title: keep searching
customer_reviews.text: I must've received one of the defective ones. The back of the bench doesn't stretch across the length of the bench. The holes dont match up and there is no way to drill without compromising the "wood". The bottom piece for atorage is a flimsy piece of particle board nor sure how it will actually hold anything besides maybe pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hall bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy bench and the color is rich. I put it together by myself it was heavy but I was able to handle the pieces without help . I love it and I would recommend it. It has the full length storage. Great for shoes or that other stuff by the front door!
customer_reviews.author: cjhlp

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bench, We Will See for How Long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench despite some scary photo reviews. I love my bench and have no complaints so far. We will see if my bench breaks off at the seat portion like the others over time. If it happens, I'll update. I hope not because it is very solid, easy to put together, and had no scratches. It is similar to something you would buy at Walmart or Target, rather than a high end furniture store.
customer_reviews.author: ahoytherekitty

customer_reviews.title: Two areas where the wood is split
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my classroom. One looks and works greats. The other however arrived with two areas where the wood was cracked. Since I had someone assemble them for me, I told them to just proceed with the assembly figuring it would cost too much to return. We used wood glue and are hoping it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Iteach

customer_reviews.title: Study
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very sturdy. Good wood and all pieces fit perfectly. A lot of storage space, just didn't realize that the sitting section was short meaning only my bottom fit on the seat part, most of my legs were not in the seating part of the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty/functional/doesn’t support much weight in or on bench
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty! Is easily scratched (don’t put your keys on it). We store shoes in here. The bottom shelf is super flimsy wood so even if you want to stack your shoes high and really fill it up, I think it said it only holds around 15-20pounds in there. The bench itself only holds like 250 pounds, so you can’t fit two average sized adults on it at the same time (my husband and I aren’t overweight but we can’t sit on it together...maybe you could fit two women) which is a bit frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The finish and quality of this great for the cost. The hinge has enough resistance to hold the trunk lid open while you reach for the stored items. Assembly was tricky but not too bad. Assembly was a bit tedious. Follow the directions as there is an order that the pieces needs assembled in. I can't think how this could improve without driving up the cost- worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bench. Assembling not so much...
customer_reviews.text: This bench is Traditional and sturdy with good storage, however, the assemble instructions are very confusing and incorrect! There are no words describing the steps, only pictures. The pictures are incorrect at the beginning of the process, which leads to an incorrect look. After an hour of assembling, it was too late to “fix” the error.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a beautiful piece!! The hinges were difficult to install as there was not pre drilled holes. We had to make them. Other than that, everything came as listed in description. Glad I took a chance despite reviews.
customer_reviews.author: lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Crap bench seat
customer_reviews.text: The item was completely defective. Parts with white paint on them, two metal pieces that hold the hinge are bent and unbendable to fit correctly, not a SINGLE hole lines up correctly. The back cracked from the force of the screws and the hinge being bent. My handy man husband got it all together but it was a horrible project, only put it together because refusal to return/refund if unpackaged and ungodly expensive shipping rate. I do Not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnna Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to our foyer. My only complaint is the flimsy board at the bottom for storage. Really limits the things you can put in there.
customer_reviews.author: Jb's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I put this at the foot of the bed so we can keep extra blankets in it, and it’s awesome. My husband and I love it. The assembly was easy, and it has plenty of space. I think some reviews complained about smell but we didn’t notice anything. It’s absolutely perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: M. Brewis

customer_reviews.title: we love it
customer_reviews.text: The bench is really easy to assemble. We are in our 70's and had no problem with the assembly. Bought it to replace the storage bench on the front porch but it's too nice to put outside so we are using it for the great grand kids toy storage inside. It is sturdy enough for a 250 pound person to sit on comfortably. We are very pleased with the purchase and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture for the price.
customer_reviews.text: After seeing this locally at a furniture store and being aggrivated by the salesman, my wife and I did a quick online search and found this! Saved over $60! Assembly was easy. The only thing that prevented a 5 star rating was that it was shipped with torx style hardware, but provided an Allen wrench for assembly. It would have been nice if the pilot holes were deeper and existed for the hinges. Update... I saw some reviews stating it was not sturdy and they would not trust sitting on it. I am 250 lb and if it's assembled properly, you should have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wacker

customer_reviews.title: The perfect patio bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench was purchased for my 85 year old mother to sit outside comfortably as we celebrated her birthday with a driveby parade. Its has a great storage space, comfortable and it roomy. The price was amazing $84.00
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Overall good- one main flaw
customer_reviews.text: Overall the bench is nice...of course its not solid wood for that price!...duh!...the only flaw for me is that the bottom of the bench is weak, not solid like the rest of the bench...don't put anything heavy in it
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Bad instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are horrible. Pictures do not match instructions. I had to take apart and put together 3 times... and using a hex wrench is no fun. Still don’t think it is together correctly, but got tired of trying.
customer_reviews.author: JELLYBEAN

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd bench our family has purchased (for 2 different houses). We're very happy with the quality and sturdiness. Nice wood finish, not cheap looking at all. The storage space under the seat (which lifts up) is perfect for shoes, hats, gloves, etc. Definitely not an outdoor piece; great for an entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzlady

customer_reviews.title: dont believe the negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product and very well worth the money , I purchased 3 of them and not a single flaw , the instructions are not the greatest but if you use common sense its simple to assemble(its 5 pieces to put together and then the bench top) if you can build a square box out of material already provided cut and ready and if you made it past the third grade you should have no problem , all of the negative reviews are from individuals who were not able to meet the above stated criteria and should have ordered the installer option when they ordered the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be much better than it is.
customer_reviews.text: I don't love this. it was poorly created. The holes and pegs do not line up correctly. I was going to return it but he box was thrown out accidentally and the effort take it apart outweighs how badly I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench
customer_reviews.text: This not only looks great by the front door, the storage is great for umbrellas as well as rain shoes. Was pretty easy to assemble by myself (if you know me, I hate assembling) and very sturdy for its use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: Good value but...
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to assemble and when I got to the end, two holes where not drilled in! I couldn't drill holes, unless I took it all about!! Bummer!! I may try later, but for now it's s storage only, do not sit!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Preston

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Very small. Much smaller than expected. It’s for decoration and not much else.
customer_reviews.author: F. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: The directions that came with it had errors, was confusing and complicated. The product itself is fine, I guess, but it’s so terribly put together that it feels flimsy. You can hold almost nothing inside as the bottom is the thinnest piece of fake wood possible. Pass on this one and find something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good bench. I use it for shoe storage in my entryway. It fits a lot of shoes. I don't even use half of it. It's very sturdy to sit on as well. It is a really good size. And I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: So surprised! Great value for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood. Substantial, heavy. Lid hinge is slow-closing, to protect little, and big, fingers. 50#, so big enough for two adults to sit easily. We have it in our entryway- place to sit and remove boots, shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Real wood
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, only problem was it sat in UPS's depot in South San Francisco for a week before it got going again so I called Amazon and they sent another one out because they couldn't find the first one, well, they both came the same day, one was sent back. but great well made product very strong and solid wood, not press board. China can make some nice furniture if the wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: lsb

customer_reviews.title: First bench that came was of very good quality but came with no hardware
customer_reviews.text: First bench that came was of very good quality but came with no hardware. Upon messaging the seller, was told there were no spare parts to replace the missing hardware. After voicing my concerns of being unable to put the bench together, I was told to package up the bench to return and they would send me a whole new bench. Done. New bench comes with hardware and is of decent quality, but not as good as the first bench. After put together, you can’t tell the bench’s flaws but for the cost of the product, it should be packaged better. Bench was not hard to put together at all, holes all align just right.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: beautiful addition
customer_reviews.text: So simple to assemble alone. Well worth the price. Took just minutes to put together. I did not put the hinges on. I plan on permanently gluing mine closed for the sake of my small kids. Beautiful addition. Cant wait to display.
customer_reviews.author: Venessa

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Item had multiple damage. Broken,warped pieces. Stain was stick to foam. Also 6 of the 8 holes for the side pieces were not pre drilled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly  solid wood construction
customer_reviews.text: For its price this is really an impressive, mostly solid product. The only issue (based on my seating preference) is the back of the seat is a bit too upright for my taste, but I would easily buy a second bench.
customer_reviews.author: GVO

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bench
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sceptical at first, after reading some reviews, but I can personally say that this bench is well worth the price. It's very solid to sit on, as my wife and I have use it daily, but I would recommend purchasing a bench cushion for seating support and throw pillows for back support; other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Fun and Challenging

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!!!! My son and I set it up rather easily. It took time, but it was fairly easy to follow the instructions. It is Beautiful and Sturdy. I have had a determined hand talker that is over 300# sitting on it while giving his wild gestures (much wiggling) and i have to say i did not hear a creek from it! Very impressed! Oh, and Thank someone for the suggestion of using wood glue throughout! :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Nutter

customer_reviews.title: holds a lot of shoes
customer_reviews.text: So far seems pretty sturdy. It also holds a lot of shoes.. It was pretty easy to put together except some of the holes and the wood post didn’t line up, the wood post moved buy lightly tapping them with the screw driver. Overall happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Beth H

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold as much as I expected
customer_reviews.text: This bench looks nice and is sturdy but the storage part isn't completely enclosed. The bottom part doesn't attach to the sides, it just sits in there, so there are gaps and also two holes in it which can let dust/pet hair into the storage area, not exactly ideal. I fit two big covers, three throw blankets, and one sheet set in it and that was it. I was hoping a bit more than that would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great bench
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench! Transformed the entire front porch. For all my shoes w space left over. Cute with a blanket on it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made- you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It’s really pretty. Instructions were incomplete and hard to understand. We had to buy a tool to make a screw hole that was in the instructions but not on the product. Not very sturdy. The bottom of the storage compartment is a thin piece of plywood. Can’t put anything heavy in it.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss

customer_reviews.title: it's a good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it's a good product for price. Easy to put together and overall great look. I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Came missing several pieces (support pieces and both lids). In addition, a pre-drilled screw had gone all the way through the front piece of the bench leaving a very noticeable hole. Given previous reviews, I was expecting much better. The only good thing about it was Amazon's excellent return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Disney World Diva

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, and easy to assemble. I purchased this bench to fill in my empty foyer space and for extra seating. It was easy for me to assemble without the help of my husband. The construction is very sturdy and it seems durable. I have gotten numerous compliments from visitors on the look. It is well worth the price; which is very reasonable. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment - Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived heavily taped. The inner cardboard appeared to have been opened before. Several major components were missing. Hardware too. I just unpacked this so there are little Styrofoam balls everywhere. Now I need to make the original box work for repackaging for a return. A huge pain. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I ignored the other warnings and am so sorry I did. My unit was delivered without a bottom. Not so great for storage, when your stuff is sitting on the floor. Also, the allen wrench is such a tight fit, you hurt your hand using them. My bench also had 2 of the main support pre-drilled holes which were stripped, so I am not sure of the structure. Just overall a very poor experience and I strongly caution you find another with better reviews. Don't let the pretty picture fool you.
customer_reviews.author: CahakGirl

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bench
customer_reviews.text: I had a heck of a time putting it together as I had to do it by myself. I second person would have made a tremendous difference. But I finally got it and am very happy with it. It has a lot of storage and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mdo

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bench!
customer_reviews.text: Love this storage bench!! I love that everything goes inside so it’s hidden!! It wasn’t the easiest thing I’ve ever put together but the result was certainly worth the time!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AB Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you hate to see shoes out.
customer_reviews.text: Just a tip its definitely a two person job to put together. Once it's up it's great! Great for an entryway or mudroom. Easy to clean. I would suggest to put a water catching tray during high traffic bad weather months
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: A wedding present for my daughter & son-in-law
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item as a wedding present for my daughter & son-in-law. They were so excited when they opened it. Said it was the perfect furniture piece to complete their living room ensemble. I am actually considering buying one for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Littlehippie

customer_reviews.title: Have someone help you put together!
customer_reviews.text: Had my son help me install, or I would have gotten too frustrated! It looks great at the end of our bed and holds a lot of blankets.
customer_reviews.author: M. BOWMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great looking storage bench
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and it is very sturdy. Easy to assemble although the instructions had some wrong labeling of parts that wasted about an hour of my time. Nevertheless the assembled bench deserves a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: S P

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Love this storage bench. Perfect size for The space I wanted it for in the foyer. Easy to assemble. It suggested 2 people to assemble, but I did it by myself. Very sturdy. The bottom of the storage is flimsy so it can't hold too much weight, but it states that in the desciption.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soooo cute 😍
customer_reviews.text: I seen the bad reviews I’m not sure where things went wrong but I LOVE THIS 😍 For the price !!!!!! You can’t beat it. The storage inside of it is very useful... I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND & PLUS the seller made a price adjustment due to the product going down in price 😊 BUY BUY BUY
customer_reviews.author: Niecey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! There were a few blemish marks but other than that this is an amazing product especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Good bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bench. It fits very well in our kitchen and dining area! Bottom holding plate-wood is very thin and can't hold more weight. Storage is good to hold toys, or other light weight items.
customer_reviews.author: So

customer_reviews.title: Bad instructions but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were so incorrect. The assembly was not easy as one of the side plank is wrongly welded. We had to make it straight to go into the wood holes. Overall the product is good. They could have made the instructions easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: MrB

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The predrilled screws did NOT line up. Not worth how much we paid for it. The whole bench is crooked. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bench
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bench easy to put together. I did it in 1.5 hr. The bottom is cardboard. Nothing fancy more for decor than everyday use. Mine arrived well packaged . Only problem was two screws were not tight but it’s not worth the hasle returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bench
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of this bench. My granddaughter put it together easily in about an hour. I store Some of my wool for rug hooking In here. The storage capacity is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is the best addition to our playroom or even our living room. I would rate it a 5 star if the bottom wasn’t so flimsy. We are using it as a toy box and can’t put as many toys as we’d like do to weight. Other than that it’s perfect to sit on and great eye piece. There were a few screw holes out of align but was easy to fix
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the living room.
customer_reviews.text: Bottom is flimsy but rest of product is well made. The bottom keeps popping out when I store a futon mattress in it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

product_meta.title: Linon Home Dcor Linon Home Decor Cynthia Storage Bench, 50" w x 17.25" d x 32" h, Walnut
feature_bullets: Create added seating and storage to any space in your home
Slat back and sides. Will easily complement your homes décor

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
